channel.title: Godwar npc animations
channel.description:
Godwar npc animations.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ive added godwars animations (i ripped them from synergy-PKZ client) The stand/walk emotes work but the attack/def/die emotes doesnt work And they did on the Synergy-PKZ client/server. o.O
My client/server base are ballscape(delta)
